overview: Collection of four short films from Falcon Studios. "Steam Heat" — The film debut of Dick Fisk! Follow this handsome stud from locker-room strip-down, to shower-room soap-up, to bursting climax of his thick 10 inches! "Mr. Egan Gets His New Paperboy" (a.k.a. "Mr. Egan's Paperboy") — Jack Egan's newspaper isn't there when he arrives home from the gym, so he calls to have one sent over special delivery. Wily Jack smooth talks the young stud into delivering some heavy-duty sex action. "The Ax Master" — Don Talon is roughing it in the redwoods with a couple of horny young men. "One To One: The Runner" — Junior-college track star Dick Fisk gets a leg cramp during an overtime workout and he's helped to the deserted locker room by his hunky coach, Tom Anza.
title: Steam Heat
